name: chatis-v2
description: **ChatIS** is an overlay that allows you to show your Twitch chat on screen with OBS, XSplit, and any other streaming software that supports browser sources. It supports your [**BetterTTV**](https://betterttv.com/), [**FrankerFaceZ**](https://www.frankerfacez.com/) and [**7TV**](https://7tv.app/) emotes, always at the best available quality. You can choose to activate a smooth animation, show bots messages and fade old ones after some time. It comes with many fonts and styling options that can be combined as desired.
